text: Utzenstorf is a municipality in the administrative district of Emmental in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. It is regionally famous for its medieva castle, Landshut Castle. ==Gallery== File:Utzenstorf Baeren Strassenfront.jpg|Gasthof BÃ¤ren File:SchlossLandshut.jpg|Landshut Castle ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Utzenstorf * * Category:Municipalities in Emmental
